issues.description: The problem statement in Part 2 incorrectly states that PersonController methods take a Consumer<List<Note>> parameter, but the template (and intended solution) use Consumer<List<Person>>. This type mismatch in the description could confuse students implementing the client methods.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text to refer to Consumer<List<Person>> instead of Consumer<List<Note>> for the PersonController methods.
